data-focus-cookie='{expression="\IPS\Theme::i()->id"}'

<script type='text/javascript'>
var focusHtml = document.getElementById('focus');
var cookieId = focusHtml.getAttribute('data-focus-cookie');
{template="customizerSettings" app="core" group="ipsfocus" location="front" params=""}
for(var i = 0; i < focusSettings.length; i++) {
	var settingName = focusSettings[i][0];
	var isDefault = focusSettings[i][1];
	var allowToggle = focusSettings[i][2];
	if(allowToggle){
		var choice = localStorage.getItem(settingName);
		if( (choice === '1') || (!choice && (isDefault)) ){
			focusHtml.classList.add('enable--' + settingName + '');
		}
	} else if(isDefault){
		focusHtml.classList.add('enable--' + settingName + '');
	}
}
{{if (theme.focus_background_type == 'picker' AND ( theme.focus_picker_groups === "*" OR \in_array( member.member_group_id, explode( ',', theme.focus_picker_groups)) ) ) OR theme.focus_background_type == 'random'}}
	var loadRandomBackground = function(){
		var randomBackgrounds = [ {{if theme.focus_bg_1_enable}}1,{{endif}}{{if theme.focus_bg_2_enable}}2,{{endif}}{{if theme.focus_bg_3_enable}}3,{{endif}}{{if theme.focus_bg_4_enable}}4,{{endif}}{{if theme.focus_bg_5_enable}}5,{{endif}}{{if theme.focus_bg_6_enable}}6,{{endif}}{{if theme.focus_bg_7_enable}}7,{{endif}}{{if theme.focus_bg_8_enable}}8,{{endif}}{{if theme.focus_bg_9_enable}}9,{{endif}}{{if theme.focus_bg_10_enable}}10{{endif}}];
		var randomBackground = randomBackgrounds[Math.floor(Math.random()*randomBackgrounds.length)];
		focusHtml.setAttribute('data-focus-bg', randomBackground);
		focusHtml.setAttribute('data-focus-bg-random', '');
	}
{{endif}}
{{if theme.focus_background_type == 'picker'}}
	{{if ( theme.focus_picker_groups === "*" OR \in_array( member.member_group_id, explode( ',', theme.focus_picker_groups)) ) }}
		var backgroundChoice = localStorage.getItem('focusBackground-' + cookieId + '') || '{theme="focus_bg_default"}';
		if (backgroundChoice == 'random'){
			loadRandomBackground();
		} else {
			focusHtml.setAttribute('data-focus-bg', '' + backgroundChoice + '');
		}
	{{else}}
		// Background Picker is disabled for your group
		focusHtml.setAttribute('data-focus-bg', '{theme="focus_bg_default"}');
	{{endif}}
{{elseif theme.focus_background_type == 'random'}}
	loadRandomBackground();
{{endif}}
</script>
{template="javascriptHeadExtra" app="core" group="ipsfocus" location="front" params=""}
• {template="userBarLinksExtra" app="core" group="ipsfocus" location="front"}
app.field:
Counting down until a special event!

This is a brief description about your event which can be easily customized or removed via your theme settings in the ACP.

Footer title

This content can be configured within your theme settings in your ACP. You can add any HTML including images, paragraphs and lists.

Footer title

This is an example of a list.

  • Example link 1
  • Example link 2
  • Example link 3

Footer title

This content can be configured within your theme settings in your ACP. You can add any HTML including images, paragraphs and lists.

Footer title

This content can be configured within your theme settings in your ACP. You can add any HTML including images, paragraphs and lists.

• Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Youtube
  • Instagram

language.word: If enabled, the Search bar and User panel will switch positions.
Swap Search bar and User panel?
If "Primary and Secondary Bars" is selected above, this setting controls the height of the Secondary Navigation Bar.

Enter a valid css value for the background-position property. For example: 50% 0
Leave this blank to use the default value defined in the code.
This message is shown while the countdown is active.
Once the countdown has reached zero, this message will be displayed.

Enter a valid css value for the background-size property. For example: cover
Leave this blank to use the default value defined in the code.

The format must be: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM
Eg: 2018-03-21 23:45
If your event is occurring in a specific time zone such as a sporting event, enter the time zone here. Please visit the ipsfocus tutorial area for more information.
Enter the HTML code for your social icons in a list item: <li> </li>. Please visit the ipsfocus tutorial area for more information.

Single: uses the image and color defined below under "Default Background".
Background Picker: your users can choose their own background from the selection below.
Random: randomly display a different background on each page load.
Multi-select: Hold CTRL/CMD and select as many options you like. Application links such as Blog or Gallery will only display if the application is actually installed.
The Mobile Footer sticks to the bottom of tablets and mobiles, providing quick access to commonly used areas of your site.
Choose either dropdown menus or primary and secondary bars for your navigation.
A toggle icon will be added to your theme allowing your members to easily switch to an alternate color scheme.
Enabling this will show a FontAwesome icon before each navigation link.
This background will be used as the initial choice for the Background Picker, or as the background if Single is chosen above.
Enter the ID of the light or dark theme which you would like to switch to.

This setting only applies if "Background Picker" is chosen above.
If a group does not have access, it will be shown the "Default Background", defined below.
If an image is uploaded under the "Logo" tab, it will be used instead of the Text Logo.
Which groups can use the Background Picker?

This setting only applies if "Background Picker" is chosen above.
When the amount of thumbnails exceed the width of the Background Picker, should they wrap into a grid or create a horizontal scrollbar?
This setting only applies if "Enable countdown?" is chosen above.
Which groups can see the countdown?
Reduce the dimensions of forum icons on mobiles.
Optional: The name is displayed in the Background Picker.
Select an animated effect to overlay your screen such as snow for Christmas, or confetti for a celebration.
Holiday/event themed elements such as icons will be applied to your theme.
If you'd like to share your backgrond image selection between multiple themes, enter a shared cookie prefix here.
Increase or decrese the amount of falling elements. Higher numbers may slow down your framerate.

Enter a valid css value for the background-attachment property. For example: fixed
Leave this blank to use the default value defined in the code.

Enter a valid css value for the background-repeat property. For example: no-repeat
Leave this blank to use the default value defined in the code.
